headline: Everest Expands Board of Directors with Appointment of Darryl Page
summary: HAMILTON, Bermuda, May 20, 2025--Everest Group, Ltd. (NYSE: EG), a global underwriting leader providing best-in-class property, casualty, and specialty reinsurance and insurance solutions, announced the addition of Darryl Page as an independent, non-executive member of its Board of Directors.
